author: jmarino240
post: One sentence in the blog posting caught my eye: “I was personally astonished, having had some contact with members of the 1978 Shroud of Turin Research Project members, Dr. John Jumper and photographer Barrie Schworz.” What about Dr. Eric Jackson? (BTW, he also misspelled Barrie’s last name.).
title: More from the tours of the nine replicas
